head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PRATT, ELLEN HALLOWELL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PRATT, ELLEN HALLOWELL

block.p: PRATT-Ellen Hallowell. Age 93. On April 29, 2000. Widow of H. Irving Pratt. Mother of Ellen P. Stoia, Harold I. Pratt, Margaret P. Cardozo and the late Harriet P. Morris. Grandmother of thirteen and fourteen great-grandchildren. Sister of Mrs. Charles P. Williamson. Memorial services Thursday 2PM at St. John's Episcopal Church, Cold Spring Harbor. Memorial donations to North Haven Foundation, North Haven, ME 04853.
